unit_test_framework.helper module¶

This module contains helper functions for colored test

Uses the module Inspect for coloring information

This function getting a color to arguments that tested @param color_name: get color to arguments @return:

This function getting a parameter of arguments that tested @param param_name: get parameter of arguments @return:
